summary: "Shazam!" is a 2019 superhero movie about a teen named Billy Batson who turns into a powerful adult hero when he says the magic word "Shazam." He gets various superpowers and must learn to use them with his foster brother Freddy to stop an evil villain, Dr. Sivana, and his deadly sidekicks. The film was in the works for many years, with several writers and directors attached at different times. It was finally released in 2019 and did well with critics and at the box office.
title: Shazam! (film)
